properties.areaDesc: Outer Saginaw Bay SW of Alabaster to Port Austin MI to Inner Saginaw Bay; Inner Saginaw Bay SW of Point Au Gres to Bay Port MI
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 9 at 9:35PM EST until January 12 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 33 knots from the north
with gusts up to 45 knots. The largest significant waves will
be 10 feet with a potential maximum wave height of 14 feet.

* WHERE...Inner Saginaw Bay SW of Point Au Gres to Bay Port MI
and Outer Saginaw Bay SW of Alabaster to Port Austin MI to
Inner Saginaw Bay.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 7 PM EST Saturday
with the largest waves expected around 11 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: GALE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
